original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>成功行訛言惑眾之計，該據點民怨上升<color=#bceea7>$num1點</color>，將逐步引發暴亂！(<color=#bceea7>訛言惑眾 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent people to successfully misuse <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> to confuse the public, and public grievances in this base have risen <color=#bceea7>$num1 points</color> , Will gradually cause riots! (<color=#bceea7>Success by misleading the crowd</color>)
